title: 11/29/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 11/29/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to Pat Forde about some of the headlines College Football football produced over the weekend. Albert Breers joins the show to recap Week 12 in the NFL. Berry Tramel of the Oklahoman discusses who's on the Sooners short list to be their next Head Football Coach. And Carson Palmers weighs in on his alma mater signing Lincoln Riley to be their next Head Coach.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
